variables.name: nexus_instance_name
variables.description: String: Name of the nexus instance.

variables.name: nexus_storage_file_share_name
variables.description: String: Name of the file share used by nexus.

variables.name: nexus_enable_ingress
variables.description: Boolean: Use the ingress controller with nexus.

variables.name: nexus_init_nexus_container_tag
variables.description: String: Docker tag on the nexus container image to pull.

variables.name: nexus_admin_password
variables.description: String: Password of nexus admin user.

variables.name: nexus_agentPoolNodeSelector
variables.description: String: Which AKS node pool to use.

variables.name: nexus_cluster_issuer_email
variables.description: String: Email address of nexus cluster issuer.

variables.name: nexus_use_production_certificate_issuer
variables.description: Boolean: Use the production cert issuer.
